name: suplementia-enrich-orchestrator
description: Enrich Orchestrator Lambda - handles full enrich flow without Vercel timeout

scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package:zip
scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name suplementia-enrich-orchestrator-dev --zip-file fileb://enrich-orchestrator.zip
scripts.create: npm run package && aws lambda create-function --function-name suplementia-enrich-orchestrator-dev --runtime nodejs20.x --role arn:aws:iam::239378269775:role/suplementia-lambda-execution-role-dev --handler index.handler --zip-file fileb://enrich-orchestrator.zip --timeout 300 --memory-size 1024 --environment Variables={ENVIRONMENT=dev,XRAY_ENABLED=true,STUDIES_API_URL=https://ctl2qa3wji.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/dev/studies/search,ENRICHER_API_URL=https://l7mve4qnytdpxfcyu46cyly5le0vdqgx.lambda-url.us-east-1.on.aws/,BEDROCK_MODEL_ID=anthropic.claude-3-haiku-20240307-v1:0,ANTHROPIC_VERSION=bedrock-2023-05-31}
